content: Prof. Dr. Colin Atkinson | Fakultät für Wirtschaftsinformatik und Wirtschaftsmathematik | Universität Mannheim Skip to main navigation Skip to page content Skip to footer UniversityUniversity Information for ...Information for ...Prospective StudentsFreshmenSuchen ×Barrierefreiheit Chair of Software Engineering Prof. Dr. Colin AtkinsonSince April 2003, Colin Atkinson has been the leader of the Software Engineering Group at the University of Mannheim. Before that he was a professor at the University of Kaiserslautern and the affiliated Fraunhofer Institute for Experimental Software Engineering. From 1991 until 1997 he was an Assistant Professor of Software Engineering at the University of Houston – Clear Lake. His research interests focus on model-driven development (especially deep and view-based modeling) and dynamic software analysis/search. He received a Ph.D. and M.Sc. in computer science from Imperial College, London, in 1990 and 1985 respectively, and a B.Sc. in Mathematical Physics from the University of Nottingham 1983.Colin Atkinson is the head of the Examination Board  for the Bachelor Business Informatics course.
